Description_lang: Hardened by battle, your Stamina is increased by $s2% and your Armor is increased by $s1% of your Strength.

description_blz.en_US: Hardened by battle, your Stamina is increased by 40% and your Armor is increased by 70% of your Strength.
description_blz.es_MX: La batalla te ha fortalecido. Tu aguante aumenta un 40%, y tu armadura aumenta un 70% de tu fuerza.
description_blz.pt_BR: Calejado em batalhas, seu Vigor é aumentado em 40%, e sua Armadura é aumentada em 70% da sua Força.
description_blz.de_DE: Ihr seid vom Kampf gestählt, was Eure Ausdauer um 40% erhöht und Eure Rüstung um 70% Eurer Stärke erhöht.
description_blz.en_GB: Hardened by battle, your Stamina is increased by 40% and your Armor is increased by 70% of your Strength.
description_blz.es_ES: Al estar curtido por la batalla, tu aguante aumenta un 40% y tu armadura aumenta un 70% de tu fuerza.
description_blz.fr_FR: Vous êtes endurci par la bataille. Votre Endurance est augmentée de 40% et votre Armure de 70% de la Force.
description_blz.it_IT: La fatica della battaglia aumenta la Tempra del 40% e l'armatura del 70% della tua Forza.
description_blz.ru_RU: Опыт многочисленных боев повышает выносливость на 40% и усиливает броню на 70% от силы.
description_blz.ko_KR: 전투로 단련되어 체력이 40%만큼 증가하며, 방어도가 힘의 70%만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 戰鬥的淬鍊使你的耐力提高40%，並且使護甲值提高相當於力量的70%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 久经战斗，耐力提高40%，并获得相当于你的力量的70%的护甲值。
